DOC.brief_summary: To compare the results of the investigational test to the currently approved QuantiFERON-TB Gold In-Tube test.
DOC.criteria: Clinical symptoms consistent with a high probability of having TB disease Receiving, or are likely to receive, therapy for active TB Confirmed tuberculosis by either AFB smear and culture testing, or Nucleic Acid Amplification methods and culture testing. Between 18 and 70 years of age. Taken therapy for active TB or latent TB for more than 14 days Culture confirmation of M. tuberculosis not obtained
